note.p: Gardener. Employed by William Lacon Childe of Kinlet, Shropshire, from at least 1837.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1847/37/11), 1871 (RG10/2739/30/4)
Correspondence vol. 7, letter from John Pearson, 23 November 1858
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 October 2017)
Shropshire, England, extracted Church of England parish records (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 October 2017)
